dormitory.title: Dormitory
dormitory.description: Double or triple occupancy in our Elm or Kaufmann buildings. Shared bathrooms with a mix of twin and bunk beds.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Double or triple occupancy in the Garden Lodge with shared bathrooms.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Double occupancy with private bathroom in the Garden Lodge, or a space in one of the Fidler's Grove Cabins shared with 3 other men.

plus.title: Superior
plus.description: Hotel-style lodging with a scenic views of the Fruit Tree Orchard. Double occupancy with 2 queen beds and private bathroom.

camper.title: Camper
camper.description: Bring your own tent, sleeping bag, and towel. Includes all meals, programming, and access to bathrooms and hot showers.

commuter.title: Commuter
commuter.description: Includes all meals and programming. Does not include any overnight lodging.

online_connection.title: Digital Connection
online_connection.description: Participate in JMR31 from home via our Digital Connection option.
